Koishi:SpiritedAway.NAME: Spirited Away
Koishi:SpiritedAway.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL This card costs 0 while you are Intangible.

Koishi:GrowingPain.NAME: Growing Pain
Koishi:GrowingPain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! time(s). NL Deals damage an additional time for every Intangible you gained this combat.

Koishi:SubterraneanRose.NAME: Subterranean Rose
Koishi:SubterraneanRose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Thorns this turn.

Koishi:StingingMind.NAME: Stinging Mind
Koishi:StingingMind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! koishi:Terror twice.

Koishi:DreadfulBlow.NAME: Dreadful Blow
Koishi:DreadfulBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! koishi:Terror. NL Force target enemy to NOT attack this turn.

Koishi:ReflexRadar.NAME: Reflex Radar
Koishi:ReflexRadar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL attacking enemies.

Koishi:SubconsciousSweep.NAME: Subconscious Sweep
Koishi:SubconsciousSweep.DESCRIPTION: koishi:Id. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Koishi:MindStellarRelief.NAME: Mind Stellar Relief
Koishi:MindStellarRelief.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all debuffs from target enemy. NL It loses !M! HP times the amount of debuffs removed. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.NAME: I'm Going to Call You Now
Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! koishi:Terror to ALL enemies. NL Add So Answer the Phone to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! koishi:Terror to ALL enemies. NL Add So Answer the Phone+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.NAME: So Answer the Phone
Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.DESCRIPTION: Double ALL enemies' koishi:Terror. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple ALL enemies' koishi:Terror. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:PerfectMindControl.NAME: Perfect Mind Control
Koishi:PerfectMindControl.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! koishi:Mind_Control to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:PerfectMindControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! koishi:Mind_Control to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:ApparitionsStalkTheNight.NAME: Apparitions Stalk the Night
Koishi:ApparitionsStalkTheNight.DESCRIPTION: Lose !Koishi:SecondMagic! HP. NL If you do not have Intangible, gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:Vanish.NAME: Vanish
Koishi:Vanish.DESCRIPTION: Lose !Koishi:SecondMagic! HP twice. NL Gain !M! koishi:Ephemeral. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:GhostParty.NAME: Ghost Party
Koishi:GhostParty.DESCRIPTION: koishi:Id. NL ALL characters gain !M! Intangible.

Koishi:DanmakuParanoia.NAME: Danmaku Paranoia
Koishi:DanmakuParanoia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! additional Block for each koishi:Terror on an enemy.

Koishi:EmbersOfLove.NAME: Embers of Love
Koishi:EmbersOfLove.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to NOT attack this turn if possible. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:EmbersOfLove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to NOT attack this turn if possible.

Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.NAME: Philosophy of the Despised
Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to attack this turn if possible. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to attack this turn if possible.

Koishi:MassHysteria.NAME: Mass Hysteria
Koishi:MassHysteria.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their combined intents.

Koishi:FourthEye.NAME: Fourth Eye
Koishi:FourthEye.DESCRIPTION: Gain Frozen Eye this combat. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:FourthEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain Frozen Eye this combat. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.NAME: Release of the Id
Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random koishi:Id cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random upgraded koishi:Id cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:PredatoryInstincts.NAME: Predatory Instincts
Koishi:PredatoryInstincts.DESCRIPTION: koishi:Id. NL Apply !M! koishi:Terror to ALL enemies.

Koishi:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
Koishi:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Lose [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:GeneticsOfTheUnconscious.NAME: Genetics of the Unconscious
Koishi:GeneticsOfTheUnconscious.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile !Koishi:SecondMagic! times. NL Draw !M! cards.

Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.NAME: Rorschach in Danmaku
Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.DESCRIPTION: Id. Gain Block equal to incoming damage.
Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Id. Gain Block equal to incoming damage + 5.

Koishi:EmbryosDream.NAME: Embryo's Dream
Koishi:EmbryosDream.DESCRIPTION: If target enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL If target enemy does not intend to attack, deal !D! damage.

Koishi:JumpScare.NAME: Jump Scare
Koishi:JumpScare.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! koishi:Terror. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:HeartfeltFancy.NAME: Heartfelt Fancy
Koishi:HeartfeltFancy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Koishi:Whimsy.NAME: Whimsy
Koishi:Whimsy.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:Whimsy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:Provoke.NAME: Provoke
Koishi:Provoke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Force target enemy to attack this turn if possible.

Koishi:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Koishi:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Koishi:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Koishi:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Koishi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Koishi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Koishi:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Koishi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Koishi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Koishi:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
